Interface ComparableValidator<T extends Comparable<T>>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the value that is being validated
All Superinterfaces:

public interface ComparableValidator<T extends Comparable<T>> extends ValidatorComponent<ComparableValidator<T>, T>, ObjectComponent<ComparableValidator<T>, T>, ComparableComponent<ComparableValidator<T>, T>
